Room.Name: Secret Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a cleverly hidden passageway south of the Adamantine Hall.
Room.LongDescription: There are doors on both ends of the hallway. The north door leads back into the Adamantine Hallway. The south door is bolted and locked with a strange, silverish lock. You can see a powerful, golden light shining through the keyhole of the south door. The light is so bright, you can't seen anything else in the room.
